text: Being and Time (, 1927) is a book that was written by the German philosopher Martin Heidegger. It is his best known book and is said to be one of the most important philosophical works of the 20th century.Lackey, Douglas. 1999. "What Are the Modern Classics? The Baruch Poll of Great Philosophy in the Twentieth Century". Philosophical Forum. 30 (4): 329-46 It has greatly influenced 20th- century philosophy, particularly existentialism, phenomenology, hermeneutics and deconstruction. ==References== Category:1927 works Category:1920s books Category:Works of philosophy
